source_quote: Mark and measure the CBDR range

signature.condition: IF Daily timeframe has bearish bias and draw on liquidity is in place
signature.action: THEN measure the CBDR range (02:00 pm to 08:00 pm NY) and expect Juda swing to reverse inside 1-SD/2-SD range
signature.drawer_basis: HTF bias and institutional positioning context

source_quote: We attach 2 equal CBDR size boxes higher

signature.condition: IF CBDR range is 25 pips (healthy) with bearish HTF bias
signature.action: THEN attach 2 equal CBDR size boxes higher as 1-SD/2-SD reversal zones
signature.drawer_basis: Price positioning relative to dealing range

source_quote: Right after the NY Midnight Open price goes higher into 1-SD, FVG & -breaker, and drops towards the draw on Sellside liquidity

signature.condition: IF price reverses inside 1-SD/2-SD range with bearish PDA (breaker/FVG)
signature.action: THEN expect drop towards sellside liquidity after NY midnight open

source_quote: If both CBDR & Asian Range are quiet...that's when we can expect a potential expansion

signature.condition: IF CBDR and Asian Range are both quiet (CBDR 30-40p, Asian <30p) with clear daily bias
signature.action: THEN expect high probability expansion day with LOKZ setting HOD/LOD

source_quote: When the CBDR and or Asian Range is larger than 50 pips...avoid trading LOKZ the next day

signature.condition: IF CBDR is >50 pips or Asian Range >30p with high volume during dead time
signature.action: THEN avoid trading LOKZ the next day
signature.drawer_basis: Confirmation filter based on range size

source_quote: Doesn't mean that the Juda can't be 55-60 pips...that's a big red flag

signature.condition: IF Juda swing (Phase 2) exceeds 40-50 pips in bearish scenario
signature.action: THEN consider it a red flag for low probability trading day
signature.drawer_basis: Confirmation filter based on move size

source_quote: Price drops below the NY Midnight Open into the 1-SD/2-SD range & bullish BISI

signature.condition: IF bullish HTF bias exists with draw on buyside liquidity
signature.action: THEN expect price to drop into 1-SD/2-SD of CBDR before expanding upward
